text: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology or PVPSIT is an Autonomous institution in Vijayawada. It has permanent affiliation to JNTUK, Kakinada.https://www.jagranjosh.com/institutes-colleges/prasad-v-potluri- siddhartha-institute-of-technology-6379 It is approved by AICTE, certified by ISO 9001 - 2008 == Background == Named after the serial entrepreneur, philanthropist and educationalist Prasad V. Potluri, the College was founded in 1998. Dr. K. Sivaji Babu is the Principal of the PVPSIT. == Location == The institution is located on the outskirts of Vijayawada city at a distance of about from the city centre, on the Vijayawada-Machilipatnam Highway (NH 9). == Campus == Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology The College has about 4000 students, more than 250 faculty and around 200 technical and supporting staff. Extracurricular opportunities include NCC, NSS, National Programme on Technology Enhanced Learning NPTEL, social clubs and sports & games. == Departments == === Engineering === * Electrical and Electronics Engineering * Electronics and Communication Engineering * Civil Engineering * Computer Science & Engineering * Information Technology * Mechanical Engineering === Science & humanities departments === *Chemistry Department *English Department *Mathematics Department *Physics Department == References == Category:1998 establishments in India Category:Educational institutions established in 1998 Category:Engineering colleges in Vijayawada Category:Engineering colleges in Krishna district Category:Engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh Category:Engineering universities and colleges in India
